name: heavy wind alert
author: Rick2050
disc: In case there is a heavy wind flow near the sensor. Study to check if the sensor works

comments.author: Rick2050
comments.text: Most accurate mathematical equations used. To check for accuracy and direction. Currently relying on proportionality only to interpret relative windspeed and temparature changes.

comments.author: Rick2050
comments.text: 8:03am 8th julyheavy wind flow for 2 3 minutes observed simultaneously both in balcony and sensor reading.it seems resolution is 0.3m/s with some proportionality error. cannot check for linearity currently.

comments.author: Rick2050
comments.text: 17:00 9th June no air blow and heavy particles in the air. later slowly wind speed increased but within safe range. nothing unusual detected by sensor, however very bad weather with dust particles.  seems, a particle sensor might be needed to capture this particular event.
